titleStmt.title: A verie godly, learned, and fruitfull sermon against the bad spirits of malignitie, malice, and vnmercifulnesse. Publikely preached by Thomas Bankes, Maister of Artes, and preacher of the word. Seene and allowed
titleStmt.author: Bankes, Thomas, 1555 or 6-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, dwelling in Distaffe Lane, neere the signe of the Castle,

notesStmt.note: Leaves tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Distaffe Lane, neere the signe of the Castle
